body:
>President Trump said he resisted punishing China for its mass internment of ethnic Uighurs last year for fear of jeopardizing trade talks with Beijing, a blunt admission of his transactional approach to human rights and willingness to subordinate other U.S. policy priorities to a potential trade deal he considers vital to his re-election.

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/06/21/us/politics/trump-uighurs-china-trade.html

Straight from the horse's mouth.

body:
Youre looking at christianity through pink tinted goggles. Firstly the catholic church was just a means of extending power upon peasants, demanding that they paids such high taxes that they were perpetually in poverty. then they sold sheets of paper called "get out of heaven cards" for 50% of a peasants yearly wages..this tricked the peasants into thinking they were going to heaven but they were actually just being kept in a state of poverty.

All this corruption led to lutheranism which sought to restore the piety into christianity and they were hunted down for it, publicly hanged and burned.

Your so called crusaders attacked other christians as much as they attacked Muslims for example hagia sophia was greek orthadox but the crusaders made it catholic by force, albeit they did return it to its original form once they left the area.

In the name of Balance Islam has suffered just as much corruption as christianity but at least there arent homosexual churches and priests yet lol. Its only a matter of time if globohomo is allowed to carry on.

Maybe youve accidently misconstrued the facts because youre not that smart, however, if done deliberately for political reasons then you are trying to stop Trump from helping the Uyghurs by stealing votes from him with lies, which would make you a psychopath.

In both cases you are fucking the Uyghur people who are modern day Jews in Nazi germany and you are an evil white supremacist who is okay with people being tortured if it means you can get your liberal desires like free college or whatever the fuck you degenerates want.

post.title: I was already a Trump supporter since 2017 because the left was too far left but today I was overwhelmed by the strongest emotions as I realise that Trump is the only one trying to protect the Uyghur people. Not a single islamic country, not even Turkey, and not anyone in Europe has ever tried to stand up to China. This man does not deserve an inkling of the abuse he gets. He truly is the greatest president to have blessed America and not only that, but the entire world. I love this man.
